10 template<class T>
11 shm_obj_ref<T>::shm_obj_ref()
12  : m_name()
13  , m_d(nullptr)
14 {
15  ref();
16 }

19 shm_obj_ref<T>::shm_obj_ref(const std::string &name, shm_obj_ref<T>::ObjType *p)
20  : m_name(name)
21  , m_d(p->d())
22 {
23  ref();
24 }

34 template<class T>
35 shm_obj_ref<T>::shm_obj_ref(const shm_name_t name)
36  : m_name(name)
37  , m_d(shm<T>::find(name))
38 {
39  ref();
40 }

44  unref();
45 }

47 template<class T>
48 template<typename... Args>
49 shm_obj_ref<T> shm_obj_ref<T>::create(const Args&... args) {
50  shm_obj_ref<T> result;
51  result.construct(args...);
52  return result;
53 }
54 
55 template<class T>
56 bool shm_obj_ref<T>::find() {
57  auto mem = vistle::shm<ObjData>::find(m_name);
58  m_d = mem;
59  ref();
60 
61  return valid();
62 }
63 
64 template<class T>
65 template<typename... Args>
66 void shm_obj_ref<T>::construct(const Args&... args)
67 {
68  unref();
69  if (m_name.empty())
70  m_name = Shm::the().createObjectId();
71  m_d = shm<T>::construct(m_name)(args..., Shm::the().allocator());
72  ref();
73 }
74 
75 template<class T>
76 const shm_obj_ref<T> &shm_obj_ref<T>::operator=(const shm_obj_ref<T> &rhs) {
77  unref();
78  m_name = rhs.m_name;
79  m_d = rhs.m_d;
80  ref();
81  return *this;
82 }
83 
84 template<class T>
85 const shm_obj_ref<T> &shm_obj_ref<T>::operator=(typename shm_obj_ref<T>::ObjType::const_ptr rhs) {
86  unref();
87  if (rhs) {
88  m_name = rhs->getName();
89  m_d = rhs->d();
90  } else {
91  m_name.clear();
92  m_d = nullptr;
93  }
94  ref();
95  return *this;
96 }
97 
98 template<class T>
99 const shm_obj_ref<T> &shm_obj_ref<T>::operator=(typename shm_obj_ref<T>::ObjType::ptr rhs) {
100  // reuse operator fo ObjType::const_ptr
101  *this = std::const_pointer_cast<const ObjType>(rhs);
102  return *this;
103 }
104 
105 template<class T>
106 bool shm_obj_ref<T>::valid() const {
107  return m_name.empty() || m_d;
108 }
109 
110 template<class T>
111 typename shm_obj_ref<T>::ObjType::const_ptr shm_obj_ref<T>::getObject() const {
112  if (!valid())
113  return nullptr;
114  typedef typename shm_obj_ref<T>::ObjType ObjType;
115  return typename ObjType::const_ptr(dynamic_cast<ObjType *>(Object::create(const_cast<typename ObjType::Data *>(&*m_d))));
116 }
117 
118 template<class T>
119 const typename shm_obj_ref<T>::ObjType::Data *shm_obj_ref<T>::getData() const {
120  if (!valid())
121  return nullptr;
122  return &*m_d;
123 }
124 
125 template<class T>
126 const shm_name_t &shm_obj_ref<T>::name() const {
127  return m_name;
128 }
129 
130 template<class T>
131 void shm_obj_ref<T>::ref() {
132  if (m_d) {
133  assert(m_name == m_d->name);
134  assert(m_d->refcount() >= 0);
135  m_d->ref();
136  }
137 }
138 
139 template<class T>
140 void shm_obj_ref<T>::unref() {
141  if (m_d) {
142  assert(m_d->refcount() > 0);
143  m_d->unref();
144  }
145  m_d = nullptr;
146 }
147 
148 template<class T>
149 vistle::shm_obj_ref<T>::operator bool() const {
150  return valid();
151 }
152 
153 template<class T>
154 template<class Archive>
155 void shm_obj_ref<T>::save(Archive &ar) const {
156  ar & V_NAME(ar, "obj_name", m_name);
157  assert(valid());
158  if (m_d)
159  ar.saveObject(*this);
160 }
161 
162 template<class T>
163 template<class Archive>
164 void shm_obj_ref<T>::load(Archive &ar) {
165  shm_name_t shmname;
166  ar & V_NAME(ar, "obj_name", shmname);
167  std::string arname = shmname;
168 
169  std::string name = ar.translateObjectName(arname);
170  //std::cerr << "shm_obj_ref: loading " << arname << ", translates to " << name << std::endl;
171  m_name = name;
172 
173  unref();
174  m_d = nullptr;
175 
176  if (arname.empty() && m_name.empty())
177  return;
178 
179  auto obj = ar.currentObject();
180  auto handler = ar.objectCompletionHandler();
181  auto ref0 = Shm::the().getObjectFromName(name);
182  auto ref1 = T::as(ref0);
183  assert(ref0 || !ref1);
184  if (ref1) {
185  *this = ref1;
186  return;
187  }
188 
189  if (obj)
190  obj->unresolvedReference();
191  auto fetcher = ar.fetcher();
192  ref0 = ar.getObject(arname, [this, fetcher, arname, name, obj, handler](Object::const_ptr newobj) -> void {
193  //std::cerr << "object completion handler: " << name << std::endl;
194  assert(newobj);
195  auto ref2 = T::as(newobj);
196  assert(ref2);
197  *this = ref2;
198  m_name = newobj->getName();
199  if (fetcher)
200  fetcher->registerObjectNameTranslation(arname, m_name);
201 #if 0
202  auto ref2 = T::as(Shm::the().getObjectFromName(name));
203  assert(ref2);
204  *this = ref2;
205  if (ref2) {
206  m_name = ref2->getName();
207  ar.registerObjectNameTranslation(arname, m_name);
208  }
209 #endif
210  if (obj) {
211  obj->referenceResolved(handler);
212  }
213  });
214  ref1 = T::as(ref0);
215  assert(ref0 || !ref1);
216  if (ref1) {
217  m_name = ref1->getName();
218  ar.registerObjectNameTranslation(arname, m_name);
219  // object already present: don't mess with count of outstanding references
220  *this = ref1;
221  }
222 }
223 
224 }
225 #endif
